channel.title: Job on Ondřej Čertík
channel.description: Recent content in Job on Ondřej Čertík

item.title: Leaving Los Alamos National Laboratory and joining GSI Technology
item.description: In December I left Los Alamos National Laboratory (LANL) to join GSI Technology as a compiler developer. I have spent about 8.5 years at LANL. Physics and computing have always been my passions, so I got a Master in theoretical physics in Czechia, and then Ph.D. in chemical physics in the U.S. LANL is a great place for computational physics. I met and worked with many amazing people. It has been intellectually very satisfying to work on the projects that I was able to help with and things to learn.
